revision.text:
<languages/> <translate> <!--T:1--> {{Infobox dungeon |name = Whirl Islands |image = [[File:Whirl Islands.png|thumb]] |caption = An inside view of Whirl Islands. |tokens = 5,000 |location = On Route 41, south of Olivine City. }} '''Whirl Islands''' is a [[Dungeons|dungeon]] in [[Johto]]. It initially has 36 tiles arranged in a 6x6 square, including 6 chest tiles, 15 non-boss encounter tiles, and 1 boss encounter tile. Wild Encounters have 92,800 HP.
== Encounter Tables == <!--T:2-->
===Wild Encounters=== <!--T:3-->
<!--T:4--> {| class="wikitable" |- ! Wild Pokémon !! colspan=2|Trainers |- ! Encounter !! Trainer !! Pokémon Team |- | [[File:Zubat.png|40px]] Zubat || colspan=2 rowspan=5|<center>N/A |- | [[File:Golbat.png|40px]] Golbat |- | [[File:Seel.png|40px]] Seel |- | [[File:Krabby.png|40px]] Krabby |- | [[File:Horsea.png|40px]] Horsea |}
<!--T:5--> ===Boss Encounters=== {| class="wikitable" |- ! Wild Pokémon !! Base Health !! Boss Trainer !! Pokémon Team !! Base Health |- | [[File:Dewgong.png|40px]] Dewgong || rowspan=2|<center>400,000 || rowspan=3 colspan=3|<center>N/A |- | [[File:Kingler.png|40px]] Kingler |- | [[File:Lugia.png|40px]] '''Lugia*''' || <center>1,410,000 |} '''*Note:''' Must have made progress in [[Questlines#Whirl Guardian|Whirl Guardian]] Questline to unlock.
==Items== <!--T:6-->
<tabs> <!--T:7--> <tab name="No Debuff">
<!--T:8--> {| class="wikitable" |- ! Chest Item !! Weight !! 0 Clears !! 100 Clears !! 500 Clears |- | align="center" colspan=6| '''Common''' |- | {{Bag2|Lucky Incense}} || N/A || 39.05% || 37.97% || 33.33% |- | {{Bag2|Token Collector}} || N/A || 39.05% || 37.97% || 33.33% |- | align="center" colspan=6| '''Rare''' |- | {{Bag2|Blue Shard}} || N/A || 20.85% || 22.14% || 27.72% |- | align="center" colspan=6| '''Legendary''' |- | {{Bag2|Revive}} || N/A || 0.21% || 0.34% || 0.89% |- | {{Bag2|Ultraball}} || N/A || 0.21% || 0.34% || 0.89% |- | {{Bag2|Mind Plate}} || N/A || 0.21% || 0.34% || 0.89% |- | {{Bag2|Sky Plate}} || N/A || 0.21% || 0.34% || 0.89% |- | {{Bag2|Mystic Water}} || N/A || 0.21% || 0.34% || 0.89% |- | align="center" colspan=6| '''Mythic''' |- | {{Bag2|Max Revive}} || N/A || 0.01% || 0.23% || 1.18% |} </tab>
<tab name="Debuff"> <!--T:9-->
<!--T:10--> After Reaching Unova, the drop chance for items in Johto will be debuffed for any loot with a Tier rarer than Rare (ie: Epic, Legendary, Mythic).
<!--T:11--> {| class="wikitable" |- ! Chest Item !!
